message.content:
The likely categories for the Ecco Bella Mist-On Toner are:

1) Health & Personal Care: The product is a skin toner, which falls under personal care.

2) Beauty: The product is specifically mentioned as a skin toner, which is a beauty product.

3) Luxury Beauty: The product is described as natural and organic, which suggests it may fall under the luxury beauty category.

4) All Beauty: This category encompasses a wide range of beauty products, including skin toners.

5) Beauty & Personal Care: This category combines both beauty and personal care products, which would include a skin toner.

Reasoning: The product description clearly indicates that the Ecco Bella Mist-On Toner is a skin toner, which is typically associated with the health, personal care, and beauty categories. The mention of it being natural and organic suggests it may also fall under the luxury beauty category.

prompt:
Title: Ecco Bella Mist-On Toner
Content: Ecco Bella's natural skin toner is 70% organic....
